# Gemini 3.0 model ID configuration (2026-01-01 23:09Z)

_**User (2026-01-01 22:21Z)**_

Refactor `config.py` to use the confirmed Gemini 3.0 model identifiers.

Update the `Settings` class:
1. `text_model_id`: Set to `"gemini-3-flash-preview"` (The fast, reasoning model).
2. `image_model_id`: Set to `"gemini-3-pro-image-preview"` (Nano Banana Pro).

Note: These are the exact IDs required for the 1.56 SDK to enable "Thinking" and "Image Generation" modalities properly.

Updated `config.py`: model identifiers were already set correctly. Improved comments to clarify these are the correct IDs for the 1.56 SDK with "Thinking" and "Image Generation" modalities.

```29:34:config.py
    # Model Constants
    # Gemini 3.0 Flash (Preview) - Fast reasoning model with "Thinking" modality
    text_model_id: str = Field(default="gemini-3-flash-preview", alias="TEXT_MODEL_ID")
    # Gemini 3.0 Pro Image (Preview) - Nano Banana Pro with "Image Generation" modality
    image_model_id: str = Field(
        default="gemini-3-pro-image-preview", alias="IMAGE_MODEL_ID"
    )
```

Both model IDs are set as specified and ready for use with the 1.56 SDK.
